title: No country other than India has better prospects for future: Maruti Suzuki Chairman RC Bhargava
description: Maruti Suzuki India Chairman RC Bhargava believes India has the best prospects for future growth. The aspiration of Indian people to improve their future and the country's rapid economic growth potential are key drivers. Maruti Suzuki's frugal management style has been instrumental in its growth.
